name: Entangled (itch) (stanfyr)
description:
Take your characters on a journey,

They are entangled, meaning for one to move, they all need to be able to move !

Have one character on every goal line and move on to the next level.

Move your characters with the directional arrows.

If you are playing on a 4K screen,  the window might be too small. press F2 to make the window bigger !

between making the last puzzle and verifying everything worked, I forgot the solution... but it should be doable.
